attributes.action: MP's Pensions Postponed increase in contribution rate.
attributes.additional_details: For Members of Parliament to justify the reasoning to postpone the intended increase of 1.85% in contributions in April 2013 to their Pension Scheme.  This decision contradicts the increases to the pension contributions of other Public Sector Schemes.

rejection.details: Decisions on Members' Pensions are taken by the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) and not Parliament or Government.
